revision.text: Possibly: Primitive Christianity Reviv'd: in four volumes. Vol. I. Containing the Epistles of Ignatius, both larger and smaller, in Greek and English. Vol. II. The Apostolical Constitutions, in Greek and English. Vol. III. An Essay on those Apostilical Constitutions. Vol. IV. An Account of the Primitive, concerning the Trinity and Incarnation. By William Whiston, M.A. 4v. (London : Printed for the author; and are to be sold by the Booksellers of London and Westminster, 1711). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2407728~S1
